ComicInfo.Summary:
Number 29 in the B.P.R.D. series.
After the death of Roger, life is continuing at The Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense.
Strange things happen to Captain Daimio, Johann is starting some research of the fourth sub-basement, and Abe received a mysterious package containing clues about is past life, sending the B.P.R.D. to the South China Sea and into the jungles of Indonesia.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/bprd-garden-of-souls-1/4000-106976/
